part.name: summary
part.summary: An error occurs while processing the XPath expression; the expression is ora:processXSLT('xsl/StripNilElements.xsl', $putVideosLACP_In.request)

part.name: detail
part.detail: XPath expression failed to execute. An error occurs while processing the XPath expression; the expression is ora:processXSLT('xsl/StripNilElements.xsl', $putVideosLACP_In.request) The XPath expression failed to execute; the reason was: oracle.fabric.common.FabricException: Error in getting XML input stream: oramds:/deployed-composites/Ivara12c/IvaraToSewerAI_rev1.0/xsl/StripNilElements.xsl: oracle.mds.core.MetadataNotFoundException: MDS-00013: no metadata found for metadata object "/deployed-composites/Ivara12c/IvaraToSewerAI_rev1.0/xsl/StripNilElements.xsl" MDS-00201: PDocument not found in MetadataStore : [store-type=DBMetadataStore app-name=soa-infra repository-name=mds-soa partition-name=soa-infra] Check the detailed root cause described in the exception message text and verify that the XPath query is correct.
